languages.text: "И ты ведь уже знаешь, о чем я... я видел это в твоих глазах, когда ты прикоснул{mf|ся|ась} к заточенной душе Иремерисс. Не лги... тебя коснулись искры того пламени, что горит во мне и что питается болью". {n}Улыбка Маражая становится победоносной.{/n}

"You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И ты ведь уже знаешь, о чем я... я видел это в твоих глазах, когда ты прикоснул{mf|ся|ась} к заточенной душе Иремерисс. Не лги... тебя коснулись искры того пламени, что горит во мне и что питается болью". {n}Улыбка Маражая становится победоносной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

"You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

"You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

"You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

languages.text: “你早就明白我的意思了，没错吧？当你触碰伊芮梅莉斯被囚禁的灵魂时，我已经从你的双眼中看到了这一点。不要撒谎……我的体内燃烧着熊熊烈焰，那种烈焰以痛苦为食，而你已经被我的火花点燃。”{n}玛拉斋脸上露出了胜利的微笑。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你早就明白我的意思了，没错吧？当你触碰伊芮梅莉斯被囚禁的灵魂时，我已经从你的双眼中看到了这一点。不要撒谎……我的体内燃烧着熊熊烈焰，那种烈焰以痛苦为食，而你已经被我的火花点燃。”{n}玛拉斋脸上露出了胜利的微笑。{/n}

languages.text: 「言葉の意味はもうわかるな？イレメリスの囚われの魂に触れたときの、お前のあの瞳。嘘をつくなよ…お前は俺の中で燃える炎の火花に焼かれたんだ。痛みを餌にする炎にな」{n}マラズハイは勝ち誇っているかのように笑う。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「言葉の意味はもうわかるな？イレメリスの囚われの魂に触れたときの、お前のあの瞳。嘘をつくなよ…お前は俺の中で燃える炎の火花に焼かれたんだ。痛みを餌にする炎にな」{n}マラズハイは勝ち誇っているかのように笑う。{/n}

languages.text: «Ya sabes a lo que me refiero, ¿verdad? Lo vi en tus ojos al tocar el alma atrapada de Yremeryss. No mientas... te chamuscaron las chispas de la llama que arde en mi interior. El fuego que se alimenta del dolor». {n}Marazhai lanza una sonrisa triunfal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ya sabes a lo que me refiero, ¿verdad? Lo vi en tus ojos al tocar el alma atrapada de Yremeryss. No mientas... te chamuscaron las chispas de la llama que arde en mi interior. El fuego que se alimenta del dolor». {n}Marazhai lanza una sonrisa triunfal.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais je ne vous apprends rien, n'est-ce pas ? Je l'ai vu dans vos yeux quand vous avez touché du doigt l'âme prisonnière d'Yremeryss. Ne mentez pas... En vous couvent les braises de ce feu qui me consume de l'intérieur, la flamme qui se nourrit de la douleur d'autrui. » {n}Marazhai affiche un sourire triomphant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais je ne vous apprends rien, n'est-ce pas ? Je l'ai vu dans vos yeux quand vous avez touché du doigt l'âme prisonnière d'Yremeryss. Ne mentez pas... En vous couvent les braises de ce feu qui me consume de l'intérieur, la flamme qui se nourrit de la douleur d'autrui. » {n}Marazhai affiche un sourire triomphant.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr wisst bereits, wovon ich spreche, oder? Ich konnte es Euren Augen ablesen, als Ihr Yremeryss' gefangene Seele berührt habt. Leugnet es nicht ... Ihr habt Feuer vom Funken der Flamme gefangen, die in mir brennt – diese Flamme nährt sich am Schmerz." {n}Marazhai lächelt triumphierend.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wisst bereits, wovon ich spreche, oder? Ich konnte es Euren Augen ablesen, als Ihr Yremeryss' gefangene Seele berührt habt. Leugnet es nicht ... Ihr habt Feuer vom Funken der Flamme gefangen, die in mir brennt – diese Flamme nährt sich am Schmerz." {n}Marazhai lächelt triumphierend.{/n}

languages.text: "Ne kastettiğimi zaten biliyorsun, değil mi? Yremeryss'in tutsak ruhuna dokunduğunda gözlerinde gördüm. Yalan söyleme... İçimde yanan o alevin, acıyla beslenen o alevin kıvılcımları seni çağırdı." {n}Marazhai'ın gülümsemesinden zafer okunuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You already know what I mean, don't you? I saw it in your eyes when you touched Yremeryss's imprisoned soul. Do not lie... you were singed by the sparks of the flame that burns within me, the flame that feeds on pain." {n}Marazhai's smile is triumphant.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ne kastettiğimi zaten biliyorsun, değil mi? Yremeryss'in tutsak ruhuna dokunduğunda gözlerinde gördüm. Yalan söyleme... İçimde yanan o alevin, acıyla beslenen o alevin kıvılcımları seni çağırdı." {n}Marazhai'ın gülümsemesinden zafer okunuyor.{/n}
